meanings.definition: To convert to the use of diesel fuel.
meanings.sent1: The old bus was dieselized, so now it runs on diesel fuel.
meanings.sent2: The company dieselized its fleet of trucks for better efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The dieselized lawnmower hummed along the grass, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her car was dieselized, transforming it into a powerful machine.
meanings.sent5: The dieselized generator roared to life during the blackout.

meanings.definition: To equip with a diesel engine.
meanings.sent1: The boat was dieselized, making it more reliable on the water.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic dieselized the tractor to increase its torque.
meanings.sent3: The dieselized motorcycle zoomed past, leaving a trail of excitement.
meanings.sent4: The truck was dieselized, giving it the strength to haul heavy loads.
meanings.sent5: The dieselized train chugged steadily along the tracks.
